import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import { MapPin, Package } from 'lucide-react' import { useState } from "react"; function Delivery() { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); // State to toggle form visibility const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ from: '', to: '', details: '', }) const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Delivery Details:', formData) // Implement form submission logic here (e.g., API call) alert('Delivery request submitted successfully!') } return ( <> < Navbar /> {/* Delivery Form Section */}
